Class: BasicCard

BasicCard(basicCardopt)

Class for initializing and constructing Basic Cards with chainable interface.

Constructor

Constructor for BasicCard. Accepts optional BasicCard to clone.

setImageDisplay(option) → {BasicCard}

Sets the display options for the image in this Basic Card. Use one of the image display constants. If none is chosen, ImageDisplays.DEFAULT will be enforced.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
